attributes.action: Stop the Nursery and Primary schools starting on 01/06/2020.
attributes.additional_details: It is a great Risk, all the parents are scared. Why is there a rush to start while the Virus is still roaming?
attributes.background: While there are deaths because of Covid-19. Why is the parliament still closed and you expect the children's to take risk, but you care about yourself and members of parliament and Secondary schools and University! this is totally unfair. We care about our kids health more than Education.
